short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFT Analytic Tool - Find The Best Rare NFT Deals Within Collections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best extension to analyze, track & discover NFTs.

Supercharge your OpenSea experience with added features :

- View floor prices and rarity rank inline with items.
- The tokens are color-coded by rarity, so you can see at a glance which tokens in your collection are rare.
- There are five levels of background color for each rarity of NFT, each based on the following rules
    - Legendary : Yellow. Traits values in the top 0.1% or higher
    - Epic : Purple. Traits values in the top 1% or higher
    - Rare : Blue. Traits values in the top 10% or higher
    - Uncommon : Green. Traits values in the top 50% or higher
    - Common : Gray. Traits values in the bottom 50% or less

And many more features to come!
